data.name: ChartStatistics
desc: offers statistical properties for the data in the chart.
It is available for a single data row and for the whole diagram.

properties.name: ConstantErrorHigh
desc: specifies the upper limit of the error range of a data row.
this setting is effective if the ChartStatistics.ErrorCategory is set to ChartErrorCategory.CONSTANT_VALUE.

properties.name: ConstantErrorLow
desc: specifies the lower limit of the error range of a data row.
this setting is effective if the ChartStatistics.ErrorCategory is set to ChartErrorCategory.CONSTANT_VALUE.

properties.name: ErrorBarRangeNegative
desc: contains a cell range string for negative error bars.
This property is used when the ErrorBarCategory is set to ErrorBarCategory.FROM_DATA.

properties.name: ErrorBarRangePositive
desc: contains a cell range string for positive error bars.
This property is used when the ErrorBarCategory is set to ErrorBarCategory.FROM_DATA.

properties.name: ErrorBarStyle
desc: determines the style of the error bars.
Use this instead of ErrorCategory

properties.name: ErrorCategory
desc: determines the type of error to indicate.

properties.name: ErrorIndicator
desc: determines how the error is indicated.
You can enable indicators pointing up, down or both.

properties.name: ErrorMargin
desc: specifies the percentage for the margin of errors.
The length of the error indicators is calculated by taking the percentage given of the largest data point value.
this setting is effective if the ChartStatistics.ErrorCategory is set to ChartErrorCategory.ERROR_MARGIN.

properties.name: MeanValue
desc: determines if the mean value for a data row is displayed as a line.

properties.name: PercentageError
desc: specifies the percentage that is used to display error bars.
The length of the error indicators is calculated for each data point by taking the given percentage of its value.
this setting is effective if the ChartStatistics.ErrorCategory is set to ChartErrorCategory.PERCENT.

properties.name: RegressionCurves
desc: determines a type of regression for the data row values.
